issue.title: Ability to manage several WMS versions in the admin panel
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

So far, the admin panel for the PROXY is able to make GetCapabilities request with WMS 1.1.1 version. It does not support WMS 1.3.0.

An evolution would be to allow the panel admin, when requesting remote server with GetCapabilities, to support different versions (1.1.0, 1.1.1 and 1.3.0)

Same logic would apply to WFS with current versions 1.0.0 amd 1.1.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hi Xavier,

I guess that such feature can be rejected.
Now easySDI is compliant with several versions of OGC services (WMS, WFS, WMTS, CSW) and displays such information in backoffice.

Am I right or do I miss something?

Thanks,

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

You are right.
